summary: MY VEHICLE IS AT 117K MILES. IT USES APPROX 6 QTS OF OIL/3000 MILES.I CANNOT GET UP TO SPEED ON THE HIGHWAY AS IT WILL NOT AUTO SHIFT DOWN WITH ANY ACCELERATION RPMS RUN AND STAY AT 6,000 WHEN TRYING TO GET TO 70MPH -  IT IS INCLUDED IN SC147 RECALL, HOWEVER THE DEALERSHIP IS STATING IT PASSED THE RECALL TEST AND IT'S THE TRANSMISSION NOT THE ENGINE. TRANSMISSION DOES NOT BURN OIL AT 6 QTS/3000 MILES
